header.title: All aboard!
header.description: Welcome to the Coding Train with Daniel Shiffman! A YouTube channel dedicated to learning creative coding through beginner-friendly projects.

tracks.title: Tracks
tracks.description: All aboard the Coding Train with Daniel Shiffman, a YouTube channel dedicated to beginner-friendly creative coding tutorials and challenges. All aboard the Coding Train with Daniel Shiffman.

challenges.title: Challenges
challenges.description: Watch Daniel take on some viewer submitted Coding Challenges in p5.js and Processing. The challenges range from algorithmic art, machine learning, simulation, to generative poetry, and more.

challengesCta.text: ready to explore? check out the newest challenges

upcoming.title: Neuroevolution - the Nature of Code
upcoming.description: Watch as Dan steps through each of these fun challenges, then put your new knowledge to work and create your own projects.

support.title: Support
support.description: Support the Coding Train and potentially get access to a number of perks like member-only content.
